description: They say this loud and terrifying thing is for fun with family and friends, but it seems better suited to enemies and nemeses.
The ore sample is Naturally Occurring Radioactive Materials (NORM). Uranium Ore samples are useful as check sources for testing Geiger Counters.
Dogs deserve to feel every bit as stylish as their human counterparts. And fortunately, this wig can help them achieve that goal.
This eye-catching garden statue is a fun (and twisted!) accent to your garden, backyard, or indoor space.
Keep your tissues close at hand with the help of your trusty feline friend.
